home.description: I specialize in solving complex problems with creative and efficient software solutions. I'm a fast learner and a passionate developer, always eager to take on new challenges.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my background, skills, and passions
about.description: I'm a passionate software engineer with experience in full-stack development, specializing in modern web technologies and data-driven solutions.

personalInfo.name: Name:
personalInfo.availabilityText: I'm currently accepting new freelance projects and open to discussion about full-time opportunities.

bio.paragraph1: I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for solving complex problems. With expertise in web development and microservices, I specialize in building responsive websites and efficient applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js, despite that I am not a slave to any specific technology stack.
bio.paragraph2: Although I am not a designer, I have a strong appreciation for design principles, my approach combines technical expertise with a strong design sensibility, allowing me to bridge the gap between design and development to create seamless user experiences. I have particular interest in innovative ideas that can instigate my creativity and bring enough challenges to feel accomplished for every milestone achieved in each project.
